title: BROKE vs PRO Gaming PC Build!
description: Today on BROKE vs PRO Ken joins the Illuminati and I build a garbage PC. The last episode of BROKE vs PRO:  Why Windows 11 Won't Work on Your PC:   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  I have a TikTok!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
